```{r}
G_combined <- 0.7*G_1 + 0.3*G_2
```

```{r}
library(fastmatrix)
power_combined <- power.method(t(G_combined), only.value = FALSE, maxiter = 100, tol = 1e-10)
```

```{r}
library(ohenery)
pagerank_combined <- as.matrix(normalize(power_combined$vector))
pagerank_combined
```
